org.ardenus.input.handler

Class GameCubeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.input.handler.InputHandler
      • org.ardenus.input.handler.GameCubeHandler

  • public class GameCubeHandler
extends InputHandler
    An input handler that can be used to listen for input from GameCube controllers using the Wii U Smash Bros. GameCube adapter.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

    • Nested Class Summary
